text: Borivoj Dovniković (12 December 1930 – 8 February 2022) was a Croatian movie director and animator. He was a member of the Zagreb school of animated films style. From 1977 to 1982 he was a member of the International Animated Film Association and was a board member of Animafest Zagreb festival. Dovniković died in Zagreb on 8 February 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Croatian movie directors Category:Animators
title: Borivoj Dovniković
